Contributor: Johnson, Riddle & Co., printer.; Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee, publisher.;
Note: Date based on dates of 1st World War. "Poster No. 79." Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Two children are by their fathers side. The little girl sitting on her dads lap, asks him what he did to help in the great war. The father looks confused as to what to tell her.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Series: Poster (Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee) ; no. 79.
